EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Transformation_Council_2017.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmation: Transformation Council: April 11-12, San Francisco
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for registering for the The Pivotal Transformation Council, taking place on April 11-12 in San Francisco. We look forward to your participation.
Agenda
Tuesday, April 11: Private Dinner Location: One Market <[[http://onemarket.com/]]> 1 Market Street San Francisco, California 94105
6:30–10:00 pm Networking and Socializing for Transformation Council members
Wednesday, April 12: Transformation Talk & Workshop Location: The Pearl SF <[[http://thepearlsf.com/]]> 601 19th St San Francisco, CA 94107
8:00–8:30 am Breakfast
8:30–8:45 am Welcome remarks by Bill Cook and Edward Hieatt
8:45–9:30 am Opening comments by Eric Ries on “Failure is not an option, it’s necessary to transform your organization.”
9:30–9:45 am Break
9:45–11:15 am Workshop on integrating fail and learn concepts into your organization
11:15–11:45 am Standups (Let’s share what we’ve learned)
11:45 am–12:00 pm Closing remarks - Eric Ries
12:00 pm Lunch (Boxed lunch provided for those traveling)
We recommend public transportation or ride sharing to both locations as street parking is limited. We look forward to you seeing you there.
The Pivotal Transformation Team
